content.text:
# Lionelle Howard

Lionelle Howard (1886 â€“ 13 September 1930) was a British actor of the silent era who was born as Francis Nathan Coxin in Cirencester, Gloucestershire and died in Uxbridge, Middlesex. He appeared in a number of productions made by Astra Films in the years after the First World War.
Selected filmography
* ''Old St. Paul's (1914)
* Barnaby Rudge (1915)
* The Man Who Stayed at Home (1915)
* The Nightbirds of London (1915)
* The Golden Pavement (1915)
* Her Boy (1915)

* A Grain of Sand (1917)
* The Forest on the Hill (1919)

* Aunt Rachel (1920)
